props.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
props.description: Quick answers to common questions about our services and process.

items.title: What is your typical executive search timeline?
items.description: Our typical executive search process takes 8-12 weeks from initial briefing to offer acceptance, though this can vary based on position seniority and market conditions.

items.title: Do you work internationally?
items.description: Yes, we conduct executive searches globally with particular expertise in Asia-Pacific, Middle East, and European markets through our office network and global partners.

items.title: What industries do you specialize in?
items.description: We have dedicated practice areas in Technology, Financial Services, Healthcare, Industrial, Consumer & Retail, and Energy & Sustainability sectors.

items.title: How do you ensure candidate quality?
items.description: We employ a rigorous assessment methodology including structured interviews, psychometric assessments, reference checks, and cultural fit evaluation.

props.heading: Start Your Leadership Journey
props.description: Discover how our services can help you build an exceptional team.
